price: 163. Diggah Nabiyow nanu wacyi kol oobisneh, Nabii Nuucuuy kaak lakal tan Ambiyal wacyi kah oobisne innah, Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii Ismaaqiliiy Nabii Iscaaqh kee Nabii Yaq-qhuubuuy kay Samadak Ambiya yekke maral wacyi oobisneh, Nabii Qiisaay Nabii Ayyuub kee Nabii Yuunusuuy Nabii Haaruun kee Nabii Suleymaanal wacyi oobisneh, Nabii Daawuuduh Zabuur deqsita kitab necee.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ كَمَآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ نُوحٖ وَٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَٱلۡأَسۡبَاطِ وَعِيسَىٰ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُونُسَ وَهَٰرُونَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā awḥaynā ilayka kamā awḥaynā ilā nūḥin wal-nabiyīna min baʿdihi wa-awḥaynā ilā ib'rāhīma wa-is'māʿīla wa-is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wal-asbāṭi waʿīsā wa-ayyūba wayūnusa wahārūna wasulaymāna waātaynā dāwūda zabūran
